General.Name: Zhejiang Jianfeng Group Co Ltd
General.Description: Zhejiang Jianfeng Group Co., Ltd. operates in the cement business in China. It offers ordinary Portland, Portland slag, and other cement products. The company also provides medical products, including sodium hyaluronate eye drops for dry eyes; calculus bovis factitious; Henopokan for patients with severe herpes zoster; and yu feng ning xin di wan for high blood pressure, dizziness, headache, neck pain, coronary heart disease, angina, nervous headache, and early sudden deafness. In addition, it offers health products comprising broken fungus spore powder, lyophilized Tianma pieces, Sangge tea, black soya bean drinks, astragalus tablets, bomb sugar, and boiling Jade Kim tea bags, as well as goodnight, bone Thai, vitamin E nutritional, Tianfu, and grape seed extract soft capsules. Further, the company provides cable products, such as SYWV-75 series physical foamed cables; RVV series cables; network lines; HYA series, which are copper core solid polyolefin insulated tidal-sheathing city communication cables; and BV line ordinary insulated and household wires. Additionally, it offers warehousing, logistics distribution, freight forwarding declaration, international trade, and other services. The company was founded in 1958 and is based in Jinhua, China.
General.Address: No. 88, Wujiang East Road, Jinhua, China

3.Name: Mr. Jianwei  Zhu
